headline.main: ESPN Doubles Up on '30 for 30' Documentary Series

docs.snippet: The series will return this fall and span two years, becoming integrated with Grantland.com, the network's sports-culture journalism Web site run by Bill Simmons. Mr. Simmons prodded ESPN to produce the first "30 for 30."...
docs.abstract: The series will return this fall and span two years, becoming integrated with Grantland.com, the network's sports-culture journalism Web site run by Bill Simmons. Mr. Simmons prodded ESPN to produce the first "30 for 30."

headline.main: Key Murdoch Aide to Be Prosecuted

docs.snippet: LONDON - British prosecutors said on Tuesday that Rebekah Brooks, a former key aide to tycoon Rupert Murdoch and onetime close friend of Prime Minister David Cameron, will face prosecution along with her husband and four others for perverting the ...
docs.abstract: LONDON - British prosecutors said on Tuesday that Rebekah Brooks, a former key aide to tycoon Rupert Murdoch and onetime close friend of Prime Minister David Cameron, will face prosecution along with her husband and four others for perverting the course of justice in the hacking scandal that has burrowed into British public life. The decision to prosecute the couple was seen as a blow to both Mr. Murdoch and Mr. Cameron who has been depicted as maintaining a cozy friendship with Ms. Brooks both in opposition and in office as prime minister since 2010.
